summary: This is an email chain from November 21, 2007, regarding the selection of attorneys Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg to handle a matter for 'Jude' (likely a typo for 'Judge' Edward B. Davis). The email, sent by legal assistant Joyce Williams, indicates Judge Davis was undergoing foot surgery and that the attorneys had been chosen to handle 'this matter,' which is presumed to be related to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Joyce Williams
persons.context: Author of the email, serving as assistant to Judge Edward B. Davis and other attorneys at Akerman Senterfitt. She relays a message about attorney selection.

persons.name: Edward B. Davis
persons.context: Referred to as 'Jude' (likely a typo) and 'Judge Davis.' He selected attorneys Podhurst and Josefsberg to handle a matter and was scheduled for foot surgery.

persons.name: Aaron S. Podhurst
persons.context: One of the two attorneys chosen by Judge Davis to 'handle this matter.' He is copied on the email.

persons.name: Robert C. Josefsberg
persons.context: One of the two attorneys chosen by Judge Davis to 'handle this matter.' He is copied on the email.

persons.name: Lewis
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who, along with Judge Davis, tried to reach the recipients unsuccessfully. Likely another legal professional or associate.

persons.name: Mia R. Martin
persons.context: Listed as one of the attorneys Joyce Williams provides administrative assistance to at Akerman Senterfitt.

persons.name: Stacy J. Harrison
persons.context: Listed as one of the attorneys Joyce Williams provides administrative assistance to at Akerman Senterfitt.

connections.description: Judge Davis selected Podhurst to handle a legal matter for him, as indicated in the email.
Judge Davis selected Josefsberg to handle a legal matter for him, as indicated in the email.
Williams is the Legal Administrative Assistant to Judge Davis.
Both attorneys were selected together to handle the same matter for Judge Davis.

events.title: Judge Davis's Foot Surgery
events.description: Judge Edward B. Davis was scheduled to undergo surgery on his foot on the morning of Monday, November 26, 2007.

events.title: Attorney Selection for Epstein Matter
events.description: Judge Edward B. Davis selected attorneys Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg to handle a legal matter, presumed to be related to Jeffrey Epstein, and this decision was communicated via email.

locations: One Southeast Third Avenue, 25th Floor, Miami, Florida 33131-1714 (Akerman Senterfitt office)
keyFacts: Judge Edward B. Davis selected high-profile Miami attorneys Aaron Podhurst and Robert Josefsberg to handle a legal matter in November 2007, contemporaneous with the early stages of the Epstein investigation.
The email communication originates from the law firm Akerman Senterfitt, indicating legal coordination regarding a sensitive matter.
The document's inclusion in the Epstein case files suggests the 'matter' being handled by Podhurst and Josefsberg is related to Jeffrey Epstein, though it is not explicitly named in this email.
The timing (late 2007) coincides with the initial non-prosecution agreement discussions and investigations surrounding Jeffrey Epstein in Florida.
